title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: Harry is summoned to attend an infamous school for wizards, where he finds himself drawn deep inside a mystical world he never knew existed and closer to his own noble destiny.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: All Harry Potter wanted was to get back to Hogwarts. As he packs, Dobby, a strange, impish creature, warns Harry that if he returns to Hogwarts, disaster will strike.
